class emflow.assets.pv.PVSystem(pv_arrays: List[PVArray] = None, capacity: float = None, surface_azimuth: float = None, surface_tilt: float = None, albedo: float | None = None, surface_type: str | None = None, *, name: str | None = None, location: GeoLocation | None = None, longitude: float | None = None, latitude: float | None = None, altitude: float | None = None, tz: timezone | None = None, timeseries: TimeSeries | None = None)[source]ÔÉÅ

Bases: EnergyAsset

The PVSystem class defines a standard set of PV system attributes and modeling functions. This class describes the collection and interactions of PV system components rather than an installed system on the ground. It is typically used in combination with Location and ModelChain objects.

pv_arrays: List[PVArray] = NoneÔÉÅ

testing here
